intro: I'm a software developer with a passion for web development. I am currently based in Birmingham, AL. My main focus is building fast, accessible, and beautiful websites for the best user experience.
Take a look at some of my work here.
about: Hello! My journey into software development is a little unconventional. I originally received a Bachelor's in Chemical Engineering from the University of Notre Dame and worked in the semiconductor industry for 4 years after graduation.

It was only after spending nearly half a decade in manufacturing that I decided to take a leap of faith and switch to software developemnt. The journey has not been easy but definitely has been fun and interesting. I continue to learn and grow my skills as a developer.
